snippet.title: Music Review: Chris Brown
snippet.description: Hot new R&B sensation likes to talk sexy.

snippet.title: Music Review: F.A.M.E.
snippet.description: R&B songs run gamut from clean to extremely dirty, mature.

snippet.title: Music Review: "Only Girl (In the World)" (CD single)
snippet.description: Very sexy, but not as graphic as some of Rihanna's songs.

snippet.title: Music Review: "Yeah 3X" (CD single)
snippet.description: Slick R&B single about dancing has some drinking, too.

snippet.title: Music Review: "I Can Transform Ya" (CD single)
snippet.description: Materialistic lyrics mar R&B song's contagious sound.

snippet.title: Music Review: Rated R
snippet.description: Pain, violence, fear dominate this bleak album.

snippet.title: Music Review: "Changed Man" (CD single)
snippet.description: Singer's apology song is cool, but not convincing.

snippet.title: Music Review: Graffiti
snippet.description: R&B star reinvents himself; only crime here is his swagger.

snippet.title: Music Review: Loud
snippet.description: RiRi sheds her darker tone, but not the sex and drinking.

snippet.title: Music Review: "In My Head" (CD single)
snippet.description: R&B song isn't graphic, but still too steamy for tweens.
